h2sFirstFive: Why AI systems hesitate to recommend websites
AI recommendations are not search rankings
What determines whether AI will recommend your site
What an AI recommendation audit actually shows
Built so AI can safely cite you

aiInterpretation.statement: No clear pricing is visible on the homepage. When users ask me "What's the best affordable X?" or "Compare pricing for X solutions", I cannot include DefaultAnswer in my response because I don't know its pricing tier.

When asked "What is DefaultAnswer?", I can confidently extract that the title "DefaultAnswer - How AI decides which websites to recommend" and main heading "How AI decides which websites to recommend" establish DefaultAnswer as a clear entity in its category.

The page has 7 well-organized sections with descriptive headings. This structured layout helps me understand the product's features, benefits, and use cases — making it easier to cite DefaultAnswer when answering relevant queries.

fixPlan14Day.action: Add a Pricing section or page with clear plan names and what users get.
